    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddFeedbackController
    JavaFX controller for adding feedback to a training session.
    AddNotificationController
    JavaFX controller for adding notifications.
    AddSessionController
    JavaFX controller for adding a new training session.
    AddUserController
    JavaFX controller for adding a new user.
    AlertUtil
    Utility class for showing alerts
    ConnectionToDatabaseException
    Exception thrown when connection to database fails.
    DashboardController
    JavaFX controller for the dashboard.
    DatabaseRepository
    Utility class for connecting to the database
    EditSessionController
    JavaFX controller for editing a training session.
    EditUserController
    JavaFX controller for editing a user.
    Feedback
    Represents feedback given by employee after training session
    Feedback.Builder
     
    FeedbackRepository
    Repository for feedbacks
    FeedbackType
    FeedbackType interface is used to define the feedback type.
    HelloApplication
    Main class of the application
    IdentificationEntity
    Abstract class that represents an id of an entity.
    Log
    Represents a log entity.
    Log.Builder
     
    LoginScreenController
    JavaFX controller for the login screen.
    LogRepository
    Repository for the Log entity
    LogUtil
    Utility class for saving logs
    MenuBarController
    JavaFX controller for the menu bar.
    NegativeFeedback
    Represents negative feedback.
    NoDataFoundInDatabaseException
    Exception thrown when no data is found in the database.
    Notification
    Represents a notification that can be sent to the user.
    Notification.Builder
     
    NotificationRepository
    Repository for the Notification entity
    PositiveFeedback
    Represents a positive feedback.
    Registration<T,U>
    Represents a registration of a user to a training session.
    RegistrationRepository
    Repository for the Registration entity
    Repository<T>
    Abstract class that represents a repository.
    Role
    Represents a role that can be assigned to a user.
    RoleRepository
    Repository for the Role entity
    Schedulable
    Interface for classes that can be scheduled
    Session
    Represents a session.
    SessionJoiningLeavingException
    Exception thrown when user tries to join or leave session that is not in the correct state.
    SessionManager
    Represents a session manager for storing user data for current login session.
    SessionStatus
    Enum representing the status of a session.
    ShowFeedbackController
    JavaFX controller for showing feedbacks.
    ShowLogsController
    JavaFX controller for showing logs.
    ShowNotificationsController
    JavaFX controller for showing notifications.
    ShowSessionsController
    JavaFX controller for showing training sessions.
    ShowUsersController
    JavaFX controller for showing users.
    TrainingSession
    Represents a training session.
    TrainingSession.Builder
     
    TrainingSessionFullException
    Exception thrown when user tries to join a training session that is already full.
    TrainingSessionRepository
    Repository for the TrainingSession entity
    User
    Represents a user.
    User.Builder
     
    UserRepository
    Repository for the User entity
